item.description: I lead the multi-disciplinary Human Centred Technology Research Cluster at the University of Sydney, Australia. I am in University of Sydney Charles Perkins Centre Nodes on Active Ageing, BABY1000 Study, Health literacy chronic disease network and Wireless wellbeing and personalised health. Advanced Technology for Education groups: Sciences and Technologies of Learning, Centre for Research on Learning and Innovation. My research is in the areas of Artificial Intelligence in Education (AIED), Ubiquitous Computing (Ubicomp) and Human Computer Interaction (HCI).
